author: n3tsurge
description: This capability outlines the process of unblocking a domain that has been previously blocked on email systems due to security concerns. It includes steps for verifying the legitimacy of the unblock request, ensuring that the domain is no longer a threat, and updating email filtering rules accordingly.

requirements.description: Verified clean state of systems and data before restoration.
Recovery procedures and backup systems available for restoration.
Monitoring capabilities to detect any signs of threat persistence during recovery.

title: Unblock Domain on Email

references.name: DNS Security and Network Filtering Best Practices
NIST SP 800-81 Rev. 2: Secure Domain Name System (DNS) Deployment Guide
CISA Alert: DNS Infrastructure Hijacking Campaign
